titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on fireworks (Class 1.4G), other than display or special fireworks.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 4/26/2012--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on fireworks (Class 1.4G), other than display or special fireworks.
